name: Escape From Body
description:
In that game you can:   

Fight with monsters with your great toothpick. 

Fight with boss.  

Explore human body. Teeth, stomach, liver, kidney, intestines.  

Destroy human body components by making holes in them. And travel in body. 

Jumping on pickles at stomach and run from acid. Platforming Level. 

Slide in intestines, and avoid brown stuff. 

Move with good timing so you will not be killed by tooth. 

Play with menu and pause buttons, they designed to be fun! 

Listen soundtrack of game.  

Listen sounds of monsters.  

Decrease hp, by taking damage. And LISTEN sounds of your pain. 

Will update and make that game better than before.  

Future updates: New level,  post processing, updating existing levels.  

Made for ForkJam by 3 days.  

Developers: Stepan Novatorskyi(me), maraichik.
